mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.phase_id AS "phase.id", ph.name AS "phase.name", a.hierarchy_id AS "hierarchy.id", h.name AS "hierarchy.name", h.society_level AS "hierarchy.societyLevel", h.society_score_min AS "hierarchy.societyScoreMin", h.society_score_max AS "hierarchy.societyScoreMax", h.culture_level AS "hierarchy.cultureLevel", h.culture_score_min AS "hierarchy.cultureScoreMin", h.culture_score_max AS "hierarchy.cultureScoreMax", h.expression AS "hierarchy.expression", h.economy_level AS "hierarchy.economyLevel", h.economy_score_min AS "hierarchy.economyScoreMin", h.economy_score_max AS "hierarchy.economyScoreMax", a.zeta AS "zeta", a.eta AS "eta", a.theta AS "theta", a.lambda AS "lambda", a.logo AS "logo", a.description AS "description", a.alpha AS "alpha", a.beta AS "beta", a.gamma AS "gamma", a.delte AS "delte", a.epsilon AS "epsilon", a.name AS "name", a.expression AS "expression", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_persona p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN mod_phase ph ON ph.id = a.phase_id LEFT JOIN mod_hierarchy h ON h.id = a.hierarchy_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_persona( id, parent_id, parent_ids, phase_id, hierarchy_id, zeta, eta, theta, lambda, logo, description, alpha, beta, gamma, delte, epsilon, name, expression, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{phase.id}, #{hierarchy.id}, #{zeta}, #{eta}, #{theta}, #{lambda}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{alpha}, #{beta}, #{gamma}, #{delte}, #{epsilon}, #{name}, #{expression}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_persona SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, phase_id = #{phase.id}, hierarchy_id = #{hierarchy.id}, zeta = #{zeta}, eta = #{eta}, theta = #{theta}, lambda = #{lambda}, logo = #{logo}, description = #{description}, alpha = #{alpha}, beta = #{beta}, gamma = #{gamma}, delte = #{delte}, epsilon = #{epsilon}, name = #{name}, expression = #{expression}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE mod_persona SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
